1.0.name: wordpress/responsive-page-scroller
1.0.description:
Responsive Page Scroller is a Responsive WordPress Plugin which allows easy scrolling of the WordPress Page/Post from Top to Bottom and vice versa. This Plugin gives much comfort and the user can easily scroll long WordPress Pages/Posts. Your visitors will love you for giving this feature on your site. Once the Plugin is Activated it works automatically.

Responsive Page Scroller Features

  1. It works automatically when the Plugin is activated.
  2. It has an option ON/OFF to disable the Scroller Buttons.
  3. Show the Scroller Buttons in Left side or Right side.
  4. Should work in all major Browsers and WordPress themes.
  5. Simple and Easy to set up.
